languages.text: Enemies affected by toxin can’t dodge or parry attacks from this weapon

traits.locale_text: Enemies affected by toxin can’t dodge or parry attacks from this weapon

languages.text: Enemies that suffer from the {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effect cannot {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} attacks performed with this weapon.
languages.original_text: Enemies affected by toxin can’t dodge or parry attacks from this weapon

traits.locale_text: Enemies that suffer from the {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effect cannot {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} attacks performed with this weapon.
Enemies that suffer from the {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effect cannot {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} attacks performed with this weapon.
Enemies that suffer from the {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effect cannot {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} attacks performed with this weapon.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}効果を受けている敵は、この武器で攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}や{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}することができない。
languages.original_text: Enemies that suffer from the {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effect cannot {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} attacks performed with this weapon.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}効果を受けている敵は、この武器で攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}や{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}することができない。

languages.text: Все противники, на которых наложено {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравление{/g}, не могут {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклоняться{/g} от атак этим оружием и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парировать{/g} их.
languages.original_text: Enemies that suffer from the {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effect cannot {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} attacks performed with this weapon.

traits.locale_text: Все противники, на которых наложено {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравление{/g}, не могут {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклоняться{/g} от атак этим оружием и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парировать{/g} их.
Все противники, на которых наложено {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравление{/g}, не могут {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклоняться{/g} от атак этим оружием и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парировать{/g} их.
Все противники, на которых наложено {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравление{/g}, не могут {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклоняться{/g} от атак этим оружием и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парировать{/g} их.

languages.text: Mit dem {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g}-Effekt belegte Gegnern können Angriffen mit dieser Waffe nicht {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausweichen{/g} und sie nicht {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parieren{/g}.
languages.original_text: Enemies that suffer from the {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effect cannot {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} attacks performed with this weapon.

traits.locale_text: Mit dem {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g}-Effekt belegte Gegnern können Angriffen mit dieser Waffe nicht {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausweichen{/g} und sie nicht {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parieren{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toksin{/g} etkisinden muzdarip düşmanlar, bu silahla yapılan saldırılara karşı {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} yapamaz.
languages.original_text: Enemies that suffer from the {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effect cannot {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} attacks performed with this weapon.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toksin{/g} etkisinden muzdarip düşmanlar, bu silahla yapılan saldırılara karşı {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} yapamaz.

languages.text: Les ennemis subissant l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} ne peuvent plus {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiver{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parer{/g} les attaques effectuées avec cette arme.

languages.text: Los enemigos que sufren el efecto {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} no pueden {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivar{/g} ni {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parar{/g} los ataques efectuados con esta arma.

languages.text: 受到{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}效果影响的敌人，无法{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}这把武器发动的攻击。
